Description of incident: Eastern Washington University is trying to notify up to 130,000 current or former students whose names, Social Security numbers and dates of birth were on a computer network involved in a security breach. The student information goes back to 1987. The notification process could take up to two weeks. The University recently discovered the breach during an assessment of its network. Information-technology staff also discovered that the hacker installed software to store and share video files on the system.
